snippet.title: Trip's Voyage Gem Rush itch.io Trailer
snippet.description:
💎 Play Trip's Voyage: Gem Rush on itch.io! 💎
https://eupholace.itch.io/trips-voyage-gem-rush

The Brothers Boo are back 👻The original minigame from Trip's Voyage, now on itch.io!

A fast-paced, arcade-style minigame about chasing a high-score while being chased by some ghastly foes! Originally a minigame called "Well Raider" from the game Trip's Voyage made inside Dreams for the PS4/PS5. This Unity port has an all-new graphical style, a new ghost enemy, and a whole lot of polish.

=== Game Credits ===
William Butkevicius - Design and Director
Michael Butkevicius - Programming
Russell Mehringer - Sound Effects
Owen Laughinghouse - Composer
Luxaic - Art and Animation
